      • addSingleValueTo2DArray

        private static java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> addSingleValueTo2DArray(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> allColumns,
                                                                                        int arrayIndex,
                                                                                        java.lang.String value)
        Add a value to one of the arrays in a 2D array
        Parameters:
        allColumns - 2D array to add a value to
        arrayIndex - Index of the array to add a value to
        value - Value to add to the array First try to add an element from row to the *i*th list, if the *i*th list does not exist yet catch the IndexOutOfBoundsException, make a new list and it at the *i*th position of the 2D array allColumns

      • readTabDelimitedColumns

        public static java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> readTabDelimitedColumns(java.lang.String filepath)
                                                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Reads tab delimited file and returns them as list of list, with [x] = colummn and [x][y] is value in column. Needed for reading counts file, as there the rows are the samples, as opposed to expression and genotype file where the columns are the samples. Needs to be read in memory, so minimal memory requirement is larger than the size of the counts file.
        Parameters:
        filepath - The path to a tab delimited file to read
        Returns:
        A 2D array with each array being one column from filepath
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
